week_1.Monday: 20 minutes of cardio, 3 sets of 15 crunches, 3 sets of 15 leg raises, 3 sets of 15 Russian twists
week_1.Wednesday: 20 minutes of cardio, 3 sets of 15 bicycle crunches, 3 sets of 15 reverse crunches, 3 sets of 15 plank jacks
week_1.Friday: 20 minutes of cardio, 3 sets of 15 mountain climbers, 3 sets of 15 side plank dips, 3 sets of 15 flutter kicks
